about_the_game:
This soundtrack contains the main theme of Maid Cafe on Electric Street and the music tracks that accompany the story, as well as tracks from the developer's other games Wuxia Archive and Change, which can also be played in-game.

Enjoy the Colorful Everyday Life on Electric Street

Every morning, the sun rises at a leisurely pace as you're fully recharged with energy. Get ready to spend another day at the maid cafe on Electric Street with your cute and reliable maids!
detailed_description:
This soundtrack contains the main theme of Maid Cafe on Electric Street and the music tracks that accompany the story, as well as tracks from the developer's other games Wuxia Archive and Change, which can also be played in-game.
